ComicInfo.Summary:
The tenth issue of the Bob’s Burgers comic book is sizzling with new stories! Louise finds herself pixelated when she’s sucked into a video game; Gene’s rhymes climb to new heights in Jack and the Gene-stalk; and Tina tells a particularly tall tale about a nuclear accident, a school dance, and a fleet of Russian submarines. Everyone loves Bob’s Burgers, the fan-favorite animated sitcom that airs on Fox television with other hits such as The Simpsons and Family Guy!
ContentsTina's Erotic Friend Fiction Presents: 50-Foot TinaLouise's Unsolved Mysteries and Curious Curiosities Presents: Game Over, Part 1Gene's Rhymey Rhymes That Could One Day Be Songs Presents: Jack and the Gene-Stalk, Part 1*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Anthony Aguinaldo | 1 | B | Cover B | Damon Wong | 2 | C/LE | Rare "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Anthony Aguinaldo | 3 | D/RE | Exceed Comic: A Divison of Jesse James Comics Exclusive Variant Cover | Anthony Aguinaldo | 4 | E/RE | Hot Topic Exclusive Variant Cover | Sara Richard | 5 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-29 20:23:23. [CVDB523273]
